features.name: Passwordless OTP Authentication
features.description: Users authenticate via email OTP (magic link). No password field exists. Users enter email, receive 6-digit code, and enter code to login. Test emails ending in @example.com use mock OTP 123456. Login flow: /login -> /login/verify (enter OTP) -> dashboard. Signup flow: /signup -> /signup/verify (enter OTP) -> onboarding.
